TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAdvice extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the element within a SAML assertion that contains additional information provided by the SAML authority.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `<saml:Advice>` element within a SAML assertion is an extension point for SAML tokens. One example of how to use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice> class is to provide supporting information about the SAML authority issuing the SAML assertion. This supporting information can be in the form of a SAML assertion or a reference to a SAML assertion, which are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> properties, respectively.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When this constructor is called and the instance is not modified prior to serializing it into XML by calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.WriteXml%2A> method, an empty `<saml:Advice>` element is generated by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.WriteXml%2A> method.

Public ReadOnly Property AssertionIdReferences As IList(Of String)

member this.AssertionIdReferences : System.Collections.Generic.IList<string>

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of references to SAML assertions.
Docs.value: An of type that contains a collection of references to SAML assertions that provide additional information on a SAML assertion.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property corresponds to the `<saml:AssertionIDReference>` child element of the `<saml:Advice>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification.
When the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> property is `true`, the collection that is returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property is read-only.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of SAML assertions.
Docs.value: An of type that contains SAML assertions that provides additional information for a SAML assertion.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property corresponds to the `<saml:Assertion>` child element of the `<saml:Advice>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification.
When the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> property is `true`, the collection that is returned from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> property is read-only.
